scripts.report:allure: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open  allure-report
scripts.report:run: npx cypress run && npx allure generate --clean allure-results
scripts.tests:allure: npm run report:run && npm run result:run
scripts.Test:report: npx cypress run && npx allure serve allure-results && npx allure generate allure-results
